name: SANONTA - Finnish Proverb Game
description:
Interested in Finnish culture or simply a lover of cute animals and snow?
Sanonta is a memory/clicker game where our charming Finnish girl Aino tells you fun facts about Finland and shares her favorite Finnish proverbs, English translated of course!

• Enjoy a large collection of Finnish proverbs imbued with ancient Nordic wisdom.

• Play simple memory/clicker mini games to advance and unlock more proverbs.

• 6 different levels, all featuring common Finnish locations and themes.

• All levels have unique Finland facts to unlock.

• A cute card deck with 18 different pictures of common Finnish animals and birds.

• Enjoy relaxing, hurry-free gameplay.

• Calming soundtrack.

• Full controller support.
